works.description:
Members Undertaking to their bookanycontractor Customers: I agree to:
1.Be realistic regarding work dates, length of time to carry out contract
2.To be honest in all dealings with customers
3.If you are unable to carry out work estimated, to let customer know immediately, to allow customer to get another trader
4.Keep to all appointments booked and appointment times. If you are unable to make original time or date, call the customer to let them know and possibly re-schedule
5.If unable to carry out the contract booked, refer customer back to bookanycontractor so we may help the customer ﬁnd another trader
6.Inform customer of any call-out fee to be charged before attending the works
7.Be courteous and respectful to all customers, their property and their belongings
8.Reply and deal with any customer complaints received promptly without confrontation or abuse
9.NEVER demand cash
10.Return all phone messages left promptly
11.Trader to keep customer notiﬁed of all aspects of work being undertaken
12.If any variations to original contract agreed, these should be added to original contract and signed as an addition by both parties (consumer and trader)
13.If any further costs due to variation in original contract, advise customer before commencing with these works
14.NEVER be verbally or physically abusive, or threaten any customer
